purpose: To provide a centralized repository of open-source AI projects for learning, collaboration, and contribution.
principle: Curates a diverse range of AI projects developed by the CrewAI community, serving as a resource hub.
reusability: Projects can be forked, modified, and extended by developers; encourages contributions and collaboration.
limitations: As a curated list, it depends on community contributions for updates and diversity of projects.
name: awesome-crewai
description: A curated list of open-source projects built by the CrewAI community. Discover, contribute, and extend the possibilities of AI agents with CrewAI.
highlight: A comprehensive collection of AI projects showcasing the capabilities of the CrewAI community.
